trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol has an appetite for destruction.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid saltpeter in the Husk)) ((Deliver the splendid saltpeter to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid mugwort in the Husk)) ((Deliver the splendid mugwort to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid magmatongue at Mjrl's Tears)) ((Deliver the splendid magmatongue to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>The workers have been experiencing all manner of difficulties of late. Worst among them are the cave-ins, which lead to cracked skulls and blocked tunnels. While we're still working on a solution to the former, we at least have a plan for the latter: explosives!

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a smattering of saltpeter. Any you can provide will be gratefully received!

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_002<tab>I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a smattering of mugwort. Any you can provide will be gratefully received!

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_003<tab>I'll spare you the details, but to make our destruction-dealing devices, we'll need a magmatongue. A generous serving of fruit worms on your hook, and they'll be jumping at the chance to be caught!
TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_004<tab>The Husk is the place most likely to have what we seek, though I must warn you, it's rather a long trip from here.
TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_005<tab>The Husk is the place most likely to have what we seek, though I must warn you, it's rather a long trip from here.

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_006<tab>While they tend to move from place to place, a large number was seen at Mjrl's Tears recently. Perhaps that would be a suitable location to begin your search?
TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Do you have what I need to try my hand at making explosives?

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_011<tab>Ah, yes. This is just what I was looking for. Probably. Once it's been combined with grasses, saltpeter, charcoal, sulphur, and just a tiny splash of urine─not mine, I might add─we should be ready to blast through that rubble!

TEXT_BANQIQ117_03822_QHOTERLPASOL_000_012<tab>To be quite frank, I've not much experience in this sort of thing, but it seems like that I can eventually perfect it through trial and error. After all, what is the worst that could happen?
